title: Basic
description: Perfect for individuals who want access to essential gym equipment and occasional training support. Ideal for beginners or casual users.
features: Access to cardio and strength zones

title: Standard
description: A balanced plan offering both equipment access and a variety of classes. Great for those who want group activities and improved fitness support.
features: Access to stretching and mobility room

title: Premium
description: Our most comprehensive plan with full access, luxury amenities, and unlimited personal support. Best for serious athletes and wellness enthusiasts.
